terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.agree: I agree to the Terms of Use. (Click Here)
terms.text:
Welcome to InterZone!

By using this app, you agree to the following terms:

â€¢ You will not post or share any abusive, threatening, offensive, or hateful content.

â€¢ You will not harass or bully others.

â€¢ You agree to our zero-tolerance policy for objectionable content.

â€¢ You may report inappropriate content via the flag feature.

â€¢ You may block users that are offensive to you.

â€¢ We reserve the right to remove content and suspend accounts that violate these terms.

â€¢ For support, contact us at interzone.devs@gmail.com

Your data is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

(Scroll down to accept)

invalidEmail: Invalid email address. Please enter a valid email.
userNotFound: No account found with this email.
genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
emailAlreadyInUse: The email address is already in use. Please use a different email.
passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 6 characters and no more than 20.
removeFriendMessage: Are you sure you want to unfriend this person?
noFriends: You have no friends yet ðŸ˜¢
emptyPostMessage: Please enter some text before posting.
locationRequiredMessage: Please click in the location icon to include your current city.
locationAddedMessage: You location has been attached to your current message.
updateAvailable: ðŸ”„ A new version of InterZone is available. Tap here to update!

EmptyCategoryScreen: You could be the first one to publish..
locationNotDeterminedMessage: Couldn't determine your location clearly. Would you like to share your raw coordinates with us to help improve the app?
confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
pleaseLogin: Please log in to view posts
deleteErrorMessage: There was an error deleting the post: {error}
noPosts: No posts yet in your city. Be the first to share something!

block.unblockedMessage: You can now see their posts again.

deleteAccount.invalidPassword: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
deleteAccount.reauthPrompt: Please confirm your password to continue.
deleteAccount.title: Delete My Account
deleteAccount.warning: This will permanently delete your account and all data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.confirmMessage: This will permanently delete your account and all of your posts.
deleteAccount.error: Something went wrong while deleting your account.

networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
unknownError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
